name: Lefree 50ft Metal Garden Hose - Heavy Duty 304 Stainless Steel Flexible Water Hose, No Kinks & Leak-Proof with Upgraded Handle, 10-Function Spray Nozzle for Balcony, Patio, Small Yard, Car Wash
short_description: 【Upgraded Design & Superior Durability】- Long-lasting garden hose 50ft, made of 304 stainless steel, works well in extreme temps, outperforming rubber hoses. Its upgraded rubber handle offers great flexibility and wear resistance, addressing the common issue of water leakage at the hadle to save water. The hose resists punctures and pet bites, and has a long service life.

【3/4" Universal Fittings, No More Leaks】- Hose Equipped with a reliable brass connector, Upgraded rubber protection handle and a built-in leak-proof rubber ring, this hose guarantees a secure and leak-free connection to your water source. 3/4-inch anti-leak connector is designed to fit standard outdoor garden taps in the US. It easy hose extension by joining two hoses together.

【Flexible and Kink Free, Easy Lefree】- Metal garden hose features a spiral interlink design, metal hose cover is tightly connected so that no matter how much the hose is pulled,the inner tube stays in place, it effectively prevents kinks and allows for easy coiling and maneuvering. Flexible water hose is easier to handle and lighter in weight compared to traditional hoses.

【Water Saving & Plant Friendly Design】- Garden hose is compatible with different watering tools such as sprinklers, nozzles, and faucets, and can connect to different water sources like outdoor faucets and indoor sinks. Metal hose allows for effortless adjustment of water pressure from zero to maximum spray, eliminating the need to painfully squeeze the trigger. The gentle water flow is gentle on plants, making it an ideal choice for garden watering, safeguarding the health of your greenery.

【10 Patterns of Spray Nozzle】- Comes with a multi-function nozzle that provides 10 different watering modes, ranging from a gentle mist for delicate flowers to a powerful jet for cleaning hard surfaces. This allows you to easily meet all your watering needs, whether it's for watering the garden, washing the car, or flushing the patio. 50 ft length, being the most popular size option, can easily cover your entire yard, offering great convenience for all your outdoor and indoor watering and cleaning needs.

【Complete Package & Great Service】- Your purchase includes a 50 ft garden hose, a 10-pattern hose nozzle, and 4 spare rubber gaskets. We are committed to providing excellent after-sales service. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us via the QA section or the Amazon message center. Conquer your garden with ease using our burst-proof, rust-resistant, heavy-duty and flexible metal water hose.

name: MEASUREMAN 25FT Heated Water Hose for RV Freeze Protection, -45 ℉Min. Working Temperature 3/4'' GHT Thread Heated Garden Water Hose, Auto-Heating, GFCI Protection
short_description: Extreme Cold Resistance & Smart Self-Heating: The heated RV water hose 25 ft boasts a minimum working temperature of -45°F (-42.8°C), paired with auto-on/off heating (activates below 47°F/8.3°C, shuts off at 60°F/15.5°C) and InstantHeat Technology. Even in frigid conditions, it melts ice quickly—just connect the power cord if freezing occurs, ideal for harsh winter RV trips.

Multi-Layer Build: Features durable multi-layer material that resists cold damage and pipe freezing. Its robust structure ensures smooth water supply all winter, standing up to repeated use in low-temperature environments.
GFCI Safety Protection: Built in GFCI protection with test/reset buttons and an indicator light detects electrical faults in advance, ensuring safe operation during camping and outdoor use.

Brass Swivel Connector: Comes with an easy-to-screw-on brass swivel connector (anti-kinking) and black protective sleeve for double durability. Perfect for tight RV/camper spaces, ensuring stable connections for your heated hose.

Wide Range of Applications: Suitable not only for RV and camper outdoor water systems, but also for home gardens, farms, and villa outdoor faucets. The 25 foot length meets most needs, offering reliable winter water supply without interruption.
product_description: MEASUREMAN Heated Drinking Water Hose utilizes upgraded multi-layer insulation material for efficient freeze protection and resilience in extreme cold. The innovative brass swivel connector design enables tool-free, quick installation while maintaining a secure connection. The 25-foot length is specially tailored for most heated RV water hoses, heated garden hoses for RVs, and heated hoses for camper setups. Easily conquer winter water troubles—simply connect it to ensure a reliable water supply, delivering consistent anti-freeze performance and steady water flow throughout the cold season. Crafted with premium reinforced materials, this hose far outperforms ordinary heated hoses in frigid conditions. The built-in auto-on/off system works efficiently to save energy. Even in the rare case of accidental freezing due to improper use, simply plugging in the power cord quickly thaws the ice without tedious manual effort. Whether used as a heated RV water hose for long trips or as a heated garden hose for outdoor maintenance, its robust construction withstands repeated use in harsh winter environments. In terms of safety, the hose integrates GFCI protection, complete with clear Test/Reset buttons and a status indicator to detect electrical faults in advance. This eliminates safety risks even in damp outdoor settings, making it a reliable heated hose for campers during winter camping. The brass swivel connector screws in effortlessly, and the black protective sleeve extends its service life. With a maximum working pressure of 450 PSI, it easily handles daily water needs—from filling RV freshwater tanks to watering plants around the camper. This all-in-one solution combines heating, freeze resistance, safety, and durability into one compact design. No complicated setup or frequent maintenance is required—it is your dependable water supply companion for winter. Whether you're hitting the road with a heated RV water hose, maintaining outdoor spaces with a heated garden hose for your RV, or settling at a campsite with a heated hose for your camper, the MEASUREMAN Heated Water Hose ensures easy access to water in cold weather, keeping your supply smooth and worry-free all season long.
